asset_id.description: The unique identifier of the asset.

asset_identifier.description: A specific identifier associated with the asset.

asset_created_at.description: The timestamp when the asset was created.

asset_updated_at.description: The timestamp when the asset was last updated.

asset_type.description: The type or category of the asset.

conversion_count.description: The total number of conversions associated with the asset.

visits_count.description: The total number of visits or interactions with the asset.

conversion_rate.description: The conversion rate calculated as a percentage.
